author: Simon Difford
description: Like other Daiquiris, this complex version benefits from dilution so consider adding a dash of water.
name: Daiquiri No.2 (El Floridita style)
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
